attributes.action: ban religion it's pointless and harmful
attributes.additional_details: Although it may have had it's relevance hundreds of years ago these days(whereas now we get the the idea of morality without involving a fictional being) it is just another excuse to draw lines between people. Religion has no relevant effect in modern life.  The eg. Philippines are getting screwed by Catholicism the crazy end of Islam is trying to kill everyone else and Northern Ireland was pretty similar.  Religion is just plain wrong and fairy stories.
